    Exercises

    JdeRobot-Academy is an open source collection of exercises to learn robotics in a practical way. Gazebo simulator is the main tool required, as ROS.

    3D Reconstruction

    Reconstruct a 3D scene from a stereo pair.

    Amazon Warehouse

    Autonomous navigation and pick-and-place logic.

    Autoloc Laser

    Robot self-localization using particle filter and laser sensor

    Autoparking

    Logic of a navigation algorithm for an automated vehicle.

    Bump and go

    Basic behaviour of bump-spin using a finite state machine.

    Car Junction

    Automated vehicle must stop and pass once the road is clear.

    Color Filter

    Develop a color filter that allow us to segment some object in the image.

    Follow Face

    Segment the faces of people and follow them through a camera.

    Visual follow-line

    Following the line painted on the racing circuit.

    Global navigation of a TeleTaxi

    Logic of a Gradient Path Planning (GPP) algorithm.

    Local navigation with VFF

    Logic of the VFF navigation algorithm using a F1.

    Qualifying Formula1

    Complete a lap to the Nürburgring circuit as fast as it can.

    Vacuum-cleaner

    Navigation algorithm for an autonomous vacuum.
